programme.title: Woo
programme.desc: Friends arrange a blind date for a mismatched couple, an insecure law clerk (Tommy Davidson) and a sassy extrovert (Jada Pinkett Smith).

programme.title: B.A.P.S
programme.desc: Two waitresses from Georgia fly to Los Angeles to audition for a music video. They want to start a business that combines soul food with a hair salon. They end up at the estate of an elderly millionaire. They bond with him and his butler.

programme.title: Carmen: A Hip Hopera
programme.desc: An engaged Philadelphia policeman (Mekhi Phifer) falls in love with a beautiful woman (Beyonc√© Knowles) while dealing with a corrupt superior (Mos Def).

programme.title: That's the Way of the World
programme.desc: Record-industry mobsters make an executive (Harvey Keitel) push a boring family trio instead of Earth, Wind & Fire.

programme.title: Firehouse
programme.desc: A rookie (Richard Roundtree) and a white bigot (Vince Edwards) clash in a city fire department faced with arson.

programme.title: Lottery Ticket
programme.desc: After winning $370 million, a young man (Bow Wow) must survive a holiday weekend with greedy neighbors before he can claim the prize.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Host: Freddie Jackson; guests Corrina, comics Charlie Burnett and Steve Luray.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Host: Tempestt Bledsoe; guests Naughty by Nature, Mint Condition, comic Franz Casseus.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Host Eartha Kitt; CeCe Peniston; Gerald & Eddie Levert; comic Flex.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Host: Jimmy Walker; guests Kriss Kross, Milira, comic Steve Harvey.

programme.title: Rise Up Black Man
programme.desc: Two best friends graduate from college and search for direction in life.

programme.title: Lyfe's Journey
programme.desc: A family man makes a mistake that changes his life forever. Now he must start a journey to forgiveness that will bring him back to love, family and faith.

programme.title: In God's Hands
programme.desc: Angie had to give up her dreams of singing because of other life obstacles. Years later, she gives her dream another shot.

programme.title: Walk by Faith
programme.desc: To cure his sickle cell anemia, a teenager (Fabiola Barragan) embarks on a journey to find a match for a bone-marrow transplant.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Natalie is suing her roommate Drew for letting her dog, Lulu, get pregnant while she was away on a vacation.

programme.title: Judge Mom
programme.sub-title: Don't Look a Gift Horse in the Mom
programme.desc: Lauren is suing her brother, Todd, to recoup money their mother loaned to him; Todd claims the money was a gift, not a loan, and that he's not responsible for any of his mother's healthcare expenses.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: After the December 13, 2009 murder of 28-year-old Deondre Williams in Cleveland, his family was rocked again by tragedy by the murder of 27-year-old Terrence Nicholson in Cleveland's east side.

programme.title: Surviving the Game
programme.desc: Chosen to lead hunters (Rutger Hauer, Charles S. Dutton) on an expedition, a homeless man (Ice-T) discovers he is to be their prey.

programme.title: Torque
programme.desc: Framed for murder by a drug dealer, a biker (Martin Henderson) must elude lawmen and the brother (Ice Cube) of the dead man.
